page.title: 19Elton Church Flower Festival
page.content: A Flower Festival and Exhibition held in All Saints Church in September 1984 was the highlight of the year in Elton. The theme of the Flower Festival was "Country Life at Elton" with different parts of the Church being devoted to aspects of that theme. For example the Altar was "Holy Matrimony" with superb white and yellow floral arrangements, whilst one window devoted to "Farming" was decorated with foliage, dried flowers, milk measures and a churn.The whole effect was very beautiful and attracted many visitors. At the same time, a fascinating exhibition of Elton's past was in the Village Hall. Old maps, documents, photographs, clothing and artefacts lent by villagers and societies were on view. Home-made refreshments were on sale throughout the weekend.
